title: Episode 10 - Cold War In The Mediterranean Part III
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: Join us in this episode as we examine a rarely looked at aspect of the Cold War, the cold war perspective from the perspective of Mediterranean. In this episode we will look at Albania, Greece, and Turkey.  Why did Albania want to side with Stalin over Tito?  Why did Greece not fall in the communist sphere of influence? How did Turkey come to be part of NATO?  We explore that those topics and many others in this episode.
